resources.string: Help stop the spread of Corona Virus
Avoid close contact with people who are sick
Avoid touching your eyes,nose and mouth
Wash your hands often with soap and water at least for 20 seconds
Stay home and get rest when you are sick
Cover Your cough or sneeze with a tissue and throw it in trash
Clean and disinfect frequently used objects and surfaces
Wash Hands with soap and water
Stay in a separate,well ventilated room
Use a tissue for each sneeze
When possible use a separate bathroom
Wear a mask,protect those around you
Dont have visitors in the house
